column5: Hey everyone  So after far too much procrastinating I just purchased an auto inflatable PFD  They're on sale at Cabelas Canada with free shipping as well... so I decided to pull the trigger and get one  This will give me and my family better peace of mind... especially during the colder months  I just wanted to share the deal for anyone looking  http://www.cabelas.ca/product/83316/cabelas-tournament-3500-auto-pfd

Keep a standard life jacket in the boat. I have an auto inflate as well and wear it while fishing, but I wear my regular jacket while I'm running the big motor. Instances of auto inflate jackets NOT inflating are very common.
Just be careful wear you store it, i kept mine in a old live well, that i plugged up....moisture got in I guess and opened the compartment to use it,  and it was blown
The crazy thing is how much warmer you are wearing the auto inflator. Must be help trap air in coat.
